verses.verse: Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H1961>keeping<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3503>Jethro,<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and he <S%H5090>led<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to the <S%H310>back<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> to <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him in a <S%H3827>flame<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H5572>bush.<s%> He <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H5572>behold,<s%> the bush <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H5572>bush<s%> was not <S%H398>consumed.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H7200>now,<s%> and see this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4758>sight,<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> is not <S%H1197>burnt.<s%>"

When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5572>bush,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4872>"Moses!<s%> <S%H4872>Moses!<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I am."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7126>"Don't<s%> come <S%H1988>close.<s%> Take your <S%H5275>sandals<s%> <S%H5394>off<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> you are <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H834>on<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>ground.<s%>"

Moreover he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>" <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> for he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H5027>look<s%> at <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7200>surely<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> who are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H5065>taskmasters,<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H4341>sorrows.<s%>

I have come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and to <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up out of that <S%H776>land<s%> to a <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

<S%H6818>Now,<s%> behold, the cry of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>me.<s%> Moreover I have seen the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> with which the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> oppress <S%H3905>them.<s%>

<S%H3212>Come<s%> now <S%H7971>therefore,<s%> and I will send you to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that you may bring my <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> "Who am <S%H3212>I,<s%> that I should go to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and that I should bring the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Certainly I will be with <S%H226>you.<s%> This will be the token to <S%H3588>you,<s%> that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5971>you:<s%> when you have brought the people <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> on this <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H935>"Behold,<s%> when I come to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H430>them,<s%> 'The God of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H559>you;<s%>' and they ask <S%H8034>me,<s%> 'What is his name?' What should I tell <S%H559>them?<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I <S%H1961>AM<s%> WHO I <S%H1961>AM,<s%>" and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>this:<s%> 'I AM has sent me to you.'"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>moreover<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3068>this,<s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H8034>you.<s%>' This is my name <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and this is my <S%H2143>memorial<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H622>together,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, "I have <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> and seen that which is done to you in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

and I have <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up out of the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>"'

They will <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and you shall <S%H935>come,<s%> you and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>him,<s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> has <S%H7136>met<s%> with <S%H3212>us.<s%> Now please let us go <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that we may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>'
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5414>won't<s%> give you permission to <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H2389>no,<s%> not by a mighty <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

I will reach <S%H7971>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with all my <S%H6381>wonders<s%> which I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in its <S%H7130>middle<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that he will let you <S%H7971>go.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and it will happen that when you <S%H3212>go,<s%> you shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7387>empty-handed.<s%>

But every <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H7934>neighbor,<s%> and of her who <S%H1481>visits<s%> her <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>clothing;<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them on your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on your <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> You shall <S%H5337>plunder<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>"
